fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: If there are no (direct) national elections, observations are not coded (missing).
fxInfo_question: Are women eligible to vote in national elections?

fxInfo_responses.value: No female suffrage. No women are allowed to vote, but some or all males vote.
Restricted female suffrage. Some women are allowed to vote, and face more or different restrictions than men
Universal female suffrage. All women are allowed to vote.

fxInfo_sources: Paxton et al. (2003); Paxton et al. (2008); Reif (GVED).
name: v2elfemrst
